snippet.title: Falcon Age - Launch Trailer | PS4, PS VR
snippet.description:
Falcon Age is available now on PS4. It’s built from the ground up especially for PS VR using Move Controllers or a DUALSHOCK®4, or PS4™ and PS4™Pro using a DUALSHOCK®4 and standard FPS controls. We want to give gamers options on how to experience the unique world of Falcon Age with custom tailored support for different playstyles and devices.

The game starts on a dying colony planet with its culture destroyed, resourced depleted, and turned into a desert by machine invaders. Ara’s been wrongfully thrown in jail for a minor infraction. While she awaits her fate in a lonely cell, she passes the time by befriending a young falcon. Together they escape and set off on an adventure to help the resistance reclaim their freedom and drive off the invaders.

https://www.falconage.com/
